attributes.review: If you’re mad about people rating this app 1 star that’s to bad sweetie. Cry me a River I’ll wait. Get over it watch the news, or go on Twitter there’s plenty of places to get what’s happening. Or is your brain just not big enough to comprehend that:(
attributes.title: Bad Cheeto

attributes.review: I was scrolling through this app to educate myself on this “fake news” that our lovely president speaks of and the next day i contracted malaria, covid, and typhoid. now i’m not saying this is related to this app but it definitely is. i am disgusted by this app and i will b suing.
attributes.title: this app gave me diseases😡

attributes.review: Let’s start from the beginning. First, I was fretted with a picture of Bernie sanders DEAD. I was flustered. I’m so confused where to go and I’m not  even old! This app asks for personal information that I’m not willing to share with a ra*ist (c and p). Trump, this was great❤️❤️🌈🧚❣️don’t do it again💖🧚🌈🌈
attributes.title: No❤️

attributes.review: I had this app, and Noh can i say it’s absolute GARBAGE! It took forever to download, I’m not sure why, I had good internet access. Second when opening the app it would crash EACH time!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD!! absolute trash.
attributes.title: If I could give 0 stars I would!!

attributes.review: This app is bad it started to play some weird music on my phone I think my phone is glitching because of it it’s over all bad don’t download it please it’s the worst app you can think of
attributes.title: Bad

attributes.review: This app is horrible. Poor design, slow, and generally hard to use. Not to mention it’s made to support a Nazi pedo. Also if any trump supporters are reading this, trump doesn’t care about you, he’s using you as leverage for power.
attributes.title: Horrendous

attributes.review: This app is horrible it makes my phone glitch so bad all day every day its not even funny Like every 5 minutes my phone act like its going to die and this only started after i got this dumb app
attributes.title: Deadly

attributes.review: This is literally the worst app ever. It has so many glitches and bugs. The app is completely useless, there is no reason for it. It’s just showing how desperate and scared Trump is. Overall, it’s the WORST app on this play store.
attributes.title: Such a disappointing app

attributes.review: I tried to get as much info as possible on the app but nothing came up whatsoever, it’s a useless app and it made my phone glitch horribly. I say we take it off of the App Store immediately
attributes.title: This app is horrible!!

attributes.review: This app stinks of racism and cheese. 🤢🤢 couldn’t breath when I opened the app just an 🍊 Cheeto lookin at me?!? I couldn’t read what was going on bc it stank so bad my eyes were watering. After a few seconds of having the app open o threw up. I do not recommend.
attributes.title: UGH
